name: Roar of the Blue-Eyed Dragons
desc: Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes" monster from your Deck, GY, or banishment in Defense Position, but if you do not control "Blue-Eyes White Dragon", you can only Special Summon "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" with this effect, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Dragon monsters. You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field, including a "Blue-Eyes" monster. You can only use 1 "Roar of the Blue-Eyed Dragons" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
